title: Did Julie Sandmann Say She Wished ‘Pioneers Had Brought More Blankets with Smallpox’?
subtitle: Social media avatars don't always correspond with the person actually using the account.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Julie Sandmann, the mother of a teenager involved in a viral confrontation with a Native American, wrote on Twitter that she wished the pioneers had "brought more blankets with smallpox"
